name: Crypto Space | Combine Nfts and Space now !
name_original: Crypto Space | Combine Nfts and Space now !
description:
Always wanted to play a 2D Horror game combining NFTS , Fun and Fear ? Now is the time

Play as Jason, a young astronaut on his first mission to an unknown planet

Everything is going well until unexpected visitors appear in a strange way

Torn between fear, betrayal and thrill, you'll have to do everything you can to survive and save Jason. But who knows, maybe he's already dead?

The special thing about our game is this: You can earn money in-game, which can be transferred to your account.

Crypto Space is the first game made by me and my partner. The version published here is the latest version available. Of course, if you like the game, we don't exclude the possibility to add more content in future updates. 

KEY FEATURES

• 2D Exceptionnal design with animations and nice sounds

• Atmospheric and appealing graphics

• Realistic sounds and game effects

You can disable the effects (Bloom, Motion Blur, Ambient Occlusion) in the setting. It would be highly recommended to enable the settings to enhance the game experience. However, It will slow down the fps at the same time. It's best only when it fits your computer graphics setting.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM

OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system 64 bits

Processor: Intel Core i5-6200U 2.3GHz

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Storage: 2 GB available space

RECOMMENDED

OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system 64 bits

Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core Processor

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Storage: 2 GB available space
